Aurora Kite

First Veper kiteboard model. Prototype model for testing purposes. Ride it and give us some feedback.

  • full woodcore
  • triax fibreglass
  • epoxy resin
  • M6 stainless-steel inserts
  • seamless resin rail
  • polyadmid top and base sheet
  • continuous 5cm rocker, soft concave
